analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/16/0xc86554bee96fdb3c85f85b576ed52d5e1eacc3a6.sol#660-663) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/16/0xc86554bee96fdb3c85f85b576ed52d5e1eacc3a6.sol#661-663)
